issues.description: The jq example uses JSONPath syntax ($.items[*]) which is not valid jq syntax. jq uses its own query language, not JSONPath.
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace JSONPath syntax with valid jq syntax. Use '.items[]' for array iteration in jq, and add '-s' flag to slurp results for counting.
issues.source_reference: jq uses its own query language distinct from JSONPath
